welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mukdahan, a charming city known for its vibrant markets, rich history, and Mekong River views. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Savannakhet Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
